response.answer_text: No. In order for something to be funny, it needs a setup and a punchline. Tension is mustered by the setup and released by the punchline. Without a setup, the punchline will fall flat.  Your question doesn't have any setup. Instead it relies solely on its self-reflection to be funny. That isn't enough. The question need to build up tension first to make its punchline effective.
is this funny!? darn, you have to click my reply…this is complicated…grrrrrr! haahaha Because the flag is an embarrassment.— Souls4Sale (@Amp2317) July 1, 2020
